name: Spiral Jumping Bounce Ball
description:
Spiral Jumping Bounce Ball is an exciting fun adventure game with bouncing ball through the real helix tower labyrinth. You have to collects the coins in the spirals game and take the rolling tower ball as downward as you can and beat the highest scores in this spinning sprial.

FEATURES:
Free to play
Simple Graphics
Small size
Adventurous game
Amazing Sounds
